com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events

Class UpdateErrataCacheEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.events.UpdateErrataCacheEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDatabaseMessage, EventMessage

    public class UpdateErrataCacheEvent
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventDatabaseMessage
    UpdateErrataCacheEvent - publish even to update the errata cache for an Org or a set of Channels.
